ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šUDPé€šä¿¡ â€‹

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„UDPå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Pythonå®ç°ã€‚

æœåŠ¡å™¨ä»£ç  â€‹

python

import socket

# åˆ›å»ºUDP socket
server_socket = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
server_socket.bind(('localhost', 12345))

print("UDPæœåŠ¡å™¨åœ¨ç«¯å£12345ç›‘å¬...")

while True:
    data, addr = server_socket.recvfrom(1024)  # æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®
    print(f"æ”¶åˆ°æ¥è‡ª{addr}çš„æ•°æ®ï¼š{data.decode()}")
    response = f"å·²æ¥æ”¶ï¼š{data.decode()}"
    server_socket.sendto(response.encode(), addr)  # å‘é€å“åº”

å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä»£ç  â€‹

python

import socket

# åˆ›å»ºUDP socket
client_socket = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
server_address = ('localhost', 12345)

message = "Hello, UDP Server!"
client_socket.sendto(message.encode(), server_address)  # å‘é€æ•°æ®

data, server = client_socket.recvfrom(1024)  # æ¥æ”¶å“åº”
print(f"ä»æœåŠ¡å™¨æ”¶åˆ°å“åº”ï¼š{data.decode()}")

client_socket.close()

æ€»ç»“ â€‹
